website_summaries.verdict: A very tall play teepee with a lot of space inside that gives kids a perfect place to dream.
pros: Made from 100 percent cotton in 1 piece that goes over the 5 poles
Large enough for adults to enjoy with the kids
Poles fit well together for a sturdy product
cons: Does not come with a carrying case

customer_reviews.title: It’s seriously like a tiny house
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER leave reviews on products but HOLY COW THIS TIPI IS HUGE! I’m 38 and wanted a tipi, so my husband got this for me. It’s seriously like a tiny house. I can read and have my coffee in it and be VERY comfortable. I’m 5’8”. Yeah, I know right, it really is THAT BIG. I have to go now, time to decorate it and get some lights for it. I’m thinking curtains for the window but I don’t know yet.
customer_reviews.author: Plaid Rope

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: My family was over the moon to finally get a teepee and I was surprised how huge it was. It’s really 7ft tall and wide enough to fit myself in there. My children have slept in this tent since it’s arrival and spend a lot of their playtime in there. The quality is outstanding. The canvas is heavy and durable. The polls fit together with pvc quality connectors. My teen boys put it together so set up is simple. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsyrain23

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old to transition from a crib to a twin size bed. More than half of the twin size mattress fits inside along w/ 2 large pillows that are tucked on the sides. It was easy to put together (20mins max) and durable (unfortunately he attempts to climb it). Love the height b/c me or my hubby can sit in it to read or play w/ him. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Price is great for the size!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a really big teepee for our 3 year olds playroom, so we really researched a lot of companies and this one was the largest we could find for the price, and it is awesome! It’s huge, the canvas material is sturdy, and it was relatively easy to set up. I like that it has an attached floor, it seems to keep it from sliding around the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months the plastic pole broke and we always had to pick the teepee up and try to get it to stand. We have now thrown it away because unfortunately it is cheaply made although the fabric seemed nice. This is an update to my original review “This is tall enough for parents to sit in with their kids. Looks good (I'm hoping the wrinkles come out) very nice quality.”
customer_reviews.author: jandtk7

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice teepee. The poles fit together very snug, the fabric of the tent is a sturdy weight and the color is what I was hoping, natural canvas. It is large so plan time to get it up and the pole placement right. Take the time, it is so worth it. I was happy to have help with the setup as it is a lot of fabric to manage. This is a great place for the eight year old grandson to do some quiet reading and playing. Enough floor space for him to actually sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rees

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed by Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset about this tent. I am completely unable to put it together because I am missing two of the poles with the drilled holes in them. We were going to use this for my daughters party and she was so excited. I am really disappointed that after searching and spending this much money on an item that I cannot even get all the proper pieces that are needed to make it function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon AL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it, his only critique is the flaps on the front don't close. He wants privacy. Easy to put together, I put it together by myself. I couldn't give it five stars because one of ties/strings at the top broke the first day. I'm still not happy with how it's tied at the top, the cloth on the tent slides down and tent won't expand properly.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy poles ruin it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this but could tell on assembly the poles were very light, and since they are segmented with 4 plastic connectors have a lot of points of failure. Alas, all the poles have bent or snapped after 2 days of use :( I'm so sad as the tent is very well made and the size is great. Why couldn't they use quality poles??
customer_reviews.author: TPBMM

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Order this Teepee for my toddler son- he loves to build forts. He has played in this so much it is so well worth it! Like the other reviews the canvas is actually pretty decent and it actually gets a tad warmer inside of the teepee too. In the winter when you can’t go out and play, this is a fun alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Was missing an important piece
customer_reviews.text: The product is flimsy quality. The poles are very hollow feeling, bend easily and I'm afraid the kids will snap these by accidentally applying too much pressure while playing. I also was shorted a top pole (one with predrilled hole to tie string through) and could not setup for the kids until I borrowed my father's drill to drill my own hole. Received 4 instead of 5. For the amount this cost it should have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: E. Alday

customer_reviews.title: The Happy place !!! a million thank yous
customer_reviews.text: Best product , 2 children and 2 adults can fit inside great quality if your looking for a great tent this is it ! I also Placed star string lights inside looks amazing, has a super sweet little window so I can peep in with out disturbing playtime , shipping was fast set up took 15 min that includes placing the lights note the lights do not come with the tent amazon recommended them when I purchased the tent so so glad I bought it ! 1000 % happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality teepee
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Like, you could fit ten children in here, no problem! 😂 I bought this for my child’s first birthday and was pleasantly surprised at how durable the teepee is and how white the color is. I am excited to decorate it with lights and garlands and lanterns. We test drive it today and she loved playing in it with me. The little window is perfect and the pocket on the inside was nice to put my phone in. It has a lot of room to put blankets and pillows and toys!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lau

customer_reviews.title: Big!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas present. So I had it a good while before it was put together. Once I had to put it together I realized that the dimensions were not accurate and then I could no longer return it. I cannot get the tent to fold out properly. It seems the poles are either too long or the material was not made big enough. Would have been great if it was made properly because it's a really great size. The Paul's are not very sturdy but if one breaks I think it's easy enough to replace
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plan ahead
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this and my 3 year old is absolutely in love with it. I would suggest super gluing the post segments together. Otherwise you will be wrestling with this everytime you have to adjust the poles. The pole segments slip out of the plastic joiners very easily. This is a total pain. I wound up having to super glue it out of frustration because it comes apart inside the canvas and has to be totally removed if you can't get it back together while it's inside the canvas.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at Teepees for a few hours, I decided on this one. I love it for it's size, which allows room for me to cuddle with my little girl and read her stories or have tea! :) I purchased a set of LED lights and fastened them to it with safety pins. It's a lovely addition to my daughters room and so far we love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Luna Bretzke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has a bottom sewn in. A great amount of room inside. 2-3 little kids could easily sit in there and play. However, definitely make sure you have the space for it. The canvas is nice and thick; not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Varney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very well packaged! Well priced as well! My child loved it so much that she wanted to sleep in it the first night. It fits 2-3 kids easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: When they say large tent, they mean it. This thing towers over me and almost touches the ceiling. Perfect for my 4' 5 year old. Many other tents are too small, but this fit the bill for taller kids. Only thing that would be nice if there was another color other than white that does not show every speck of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old daughter’s sleepover and it was perfect. I wanted something that was big enough for older children and this worked nicely. It was easy to assemble, too! Three girls fit comfortably hanging out with pillows and other things. While they did not sleep in it, I would say there is enough room for two 9 or 10 year old kids to do so and probably room enough for three younger children. I hung string lights with clothespins to add some light and decoration. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amp85

customer_reviews.title: I never leave a review unless im really satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I never leave a review unless im really satisfied with the product. I would recommend this Teepee tent to everybody, especially for kids. It is the best quality, breathable, and it doesnt have any odor. It is also spacious to fit me and my 2 1/2 son. We love having our story inside the tent, and as what my son would always say, "Mom, this is awesome."
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I am a grown ass woman, who wanted a teepee for myself. And this one is perfect. It was easy to assemble, did it myself in a bout 15 minutes. The canvas is sturdy and there is plenty of room inside and to stand. I am 5’2 and my husband is 5’7. We can both stand up inside. You could easily use thig for a private reading get away or a romantic picnic dinner. Inside or outside. I’m so excited. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JS Meeds

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD! SO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned 4 other teepees before ordering this one! THIS IS THE ONE! SO GOOD! SO BIG! Great quality. Kids love it. We have it in the middle of the play room, all four of us can snuggle and watch tv out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzana Dobrosavljevic

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had all kinds of tents for my kids and this one is by far the best. Plenty of room on the inside for the kids to lay down and sometimes camp in. I added a peel and stick zipper to the flaps/door that way it could close but not ruin the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Splinter Warning!
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed in the quality the wooden poles came in. You will definitely get splinters. We were really excited and so was my kiddo. Wish we could return but we unboxed everything and threw out the box from the excitement. We are out one pole because the connector is loose around the faulty wooden piece.
customer_reviews.author: Prixilla

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: This tent is HUGE and exciting. In hindsight for our design, I wish I had a 4 panel and not 5, but my children love it and sleep in it often. It’s a fun and magical addition to the great wolf lodge theme bedroom our son wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, off-white color. I love the material it's of great quality and it looks great in the house. This is the most used tipi. The girls love it. It's huge and endless playtime is spent in this tipi. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Talk, super fun, authentic looking But assembly ROUGH
customer_reviews.text: Is seemingly great quality and was super fun for about 10 minutes then the polls started coming apart and there is no longer any height to the TP.It must be ironed before assembly and 7030 chance the TP will even stay up however I must disclaim my son has autism and is very rough so the polls may have come down due to he and the dog being inside
customer_reviews.author: kellysenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: I like this tent a lot. The only drawback is that the flaps don't reach together very well and there's no Velcro strap or ties for it to be held more closely. Also, it's definitely durability over style.
customer_reviews.author: Hev

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's huge! My hubby and I can get right in there with our 4 year old and there's still room... Great quality. Easy to assemble. So happy that we ordered this one. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: I. cant say enough good things. My 5 yo twin boys love love love this product. It arrived quick and was not hard to assemble. Just took a few minutes to get all the poles together. My husband helped me stand up and get straight because this teepee is really big. Tall and wide and can easily fit lots of comfy pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Wise

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, horrible l instructions and expensive. Plus, the seller is not responding to me.
customer_reviews.author: janet shirrell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I said to myself I can’t put this together. But I said I’d try. I took out the pieces, followed instructions and I did it. I was very pleased with myself. I have two great grandsons who I watch three times a week. They loved it. It’s very easy to set up and take down so I can move it from room to room. Very pleased with my purchase. I received it within two days.
customer_reviews.author: kathyr

customer_reviews.title: Poles not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The poles are split into three pieces that you have to hook together with plastic pieces. One of the poles broke after a few days and now the tent won’t stand. I can’t find a replacement pole the same width and length to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Lhwll

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this teepee for our sons 6th birthday. He loves it! He slept in it the first night he had it. He lays in it and reads, watches his tablet and plays, etc. It was very easy to put together also!
customer_reviews.author: Toni P

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sturdy Solid Wood Poles
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. White isn’t a color I would use for children but it looked great and was very big. Great quality solid wood poles felt like they were there for the long run. Bigger than I anticipated which is not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but worth it. My son loves it. We use it for sleep overs in the living room. Fits most of a twin mattress inside.
customer_reviews.author: rhipea

customer_reviews.title: Over priced , will have to replace poles
customer_reviews.text: Teepee fabric is nice, but poles real cheap. Kids been playing in it and poles have broke and do move around, always have to adjust. Will have to go home depot see if can find better wood posts to hold teepee. Post that came with it are thin and connect toger with plastic connector, real cheap. Little over priced
customer_reviews.author: dtown

customer_reviews.title: Toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: We gor this for our 4 and 3 yr old boys wjo loved sleepung in a tent. We were able to fit 2 toddler/crib mattresses side by side inside of it. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dowels too small for Connectors
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the tent for older children. My daughter is almost 8 and she loves to hang out inside the tent reading and writing stories. I gave it three stars because I had to put masking tape around ALL of the dowels so they wouldn’t fall out of the connectors which was a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Mc

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best quality I’ve seen so far. My 3 kids fit in it with enough space for my husband and I to join them. It’s very cute and sturdy. The neutral color makes it easy to customize to any room. We love it and we recommend it for anyone looking to invest in one.
customer_reviews.author: Zeshan Zaveri

customer_reviews.title: Very big and fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this teepee as an idea to make a reading nook. It's in my daughter's room right now. We put a thick blanket down on the floor to act as a cushion, as well as pillows and books. She likes it so much that she sometimes falls asleep in there.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: What a sweet little tent! My 11 year old loves it. I am 5'8 and can easily fit into this teepee with her. Its pretty too. Great addition to a child's room
customer_reviews.author: caligurl

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! My daughter is 11 and she's got plenty of room to grow up in this thing. It basically fits two big bean bags and you still don't feel crowded. The strings at the top that keep everything together are a little tricky to figure out though. Other than that it provides a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnwell

customer_reviews.title: Good size teepee
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little teepee. The poles don't really stay spread out though and the actual cloth tends to slide down as the poles shift. It needs some way to keep the poles spread out, or something. It is a good size and my son does love it when it's standing well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family with more than one child
customer_reviews.text: Huge! High quality and easy to put together. Great for a family with multiple children close in age. My 50 inch child can fit in this with their two younger siblings and myself included!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent but need to offer replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tent but one of the bottom poles broke and we have no way of replacing it. It would be great if the seller offered an option to purchase extra of the wooden sticks/poles in case something like this happens. Now, the brand new tent can’t be used.
customer_reviews.author: mommaTex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my 10 y/o grandsons fort (which I tore down). I am impressed by the size and sturdiness, great quality. My grandson loves it and now prefers to sleep in his tee pee instead of his bed.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a teepee, this teepee is very tall and my 11 year olds love it.
customer_reviews.author: lish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reading/play space!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bigger than I imagined it to be (but that’s my fault for not considering the measurements!) but we love it! Got it for my 3year old to entertain during lockdown and it’s been such fun. My husband and I can both fit in with her to read books. I ordered a Papasan Chair cushion For the inside and it fits wonderfully. Added twinkle lights and véala! Dreamy teepee escape!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: So cute and big!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space inside, very tall. 5 and 7 year old boys both fit and love it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Fair price for a usable product.
customer_reviews.text: Decent, not like mine growing up, but built to fit the packaging, I get it. Overall, kids are stoked, it's big enough for two to play in and stand in. Nice overall product, and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: boatner1

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete tent kit
customer_reviews.text: So I waited 1 month for this to come in and was excited to put it together. Unfortunately I was not able to even put my tent together because it is missing one of the wooden rods. It should have 5 rods with a hole in it and I only have 4. It should have 5 rods without holes and I have 6. So I'm a bit disappointed especially since I waited so long for this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons. They absolutely love it, even choosing to sleep in it rather than their beds at times. So much better than having all the blankets all over they place as a fort they've built.
customer_reviews.author: Althea E. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids just love this! Expensive but is well worth the money. Kids lay in it comfortably plus it has a bottom so they aren't laying on the grass. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela LaBarge

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to slide support sticks to build
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly difficult to slide support wood sticks into slots and they are very flimsy. Otherwise cute & enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It's like clubhouse.
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy it and love it so much that I myself can take naps in it too. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: QESecurity

customer_reviews.title: Durable fabric accepts and absorbes paint stencils and iron on decor well
customer_reviews.text: The canvas fabric is amazing takes paint very well and beautifully I am so happy I went with this product and ths shipping was very fast I got it within 3 days of buying for my babies birthday now wr are on our journey of the painting and decorating also the material is very durable I cant wait to post pictured of our final result
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not 1 complaint
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious, very beautiful in my home. Not 1 complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Youmie

customer_reviews.title: Making memories
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun making memories in this teepee on our ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Kally Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE IT!!! Good quality! Huge!! Easy to assemble. Came out the package nicely. Was not super wrinkled. I’m 5’4’’ 135 pounds and can stand and lay in it with the kids comfortably. Really excited to have fun with this teepee!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even set this up becaus the poles won’t fit through the pole holes. The poles also don’t connect correctly with the plastic pieces. Super frustrating for an almost $100 purchase. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS HUGE AND PERFECT IN EVERY WAY! i wanted to find a teepee for our son but also for us to netflix n chill. and it exceeded my expectations lol buy this thing!
customer_reviews.author: itjustlexy

customer_reviews.title: that it is made of high quality canvas and has a bottom to the product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the prominence of product. It is in a placement of 4 teepees, creating a native american village. I am using it as a decoration for the upcoming Pendleton Round-Up in Pendleton, Oregon Thank you for such a well made item!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: so great!! super fast shipping and yes its big
customer_reviews.text: so great !! super fast shipping and yes its big !
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Happy :)
customer_reviews.text: I had the honor of meeting my boyfriends kids this weekend and I wanted to have something cool for them to play in. I’m so happy I chose this teepee. They loved it and immediately started playing when they got here.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This teepee is huge
customer_reviews.text: Love the size! It is a bit tricky to assemble, the canvas is a bit too tight for the wooden parts and plastic parts get stuck. But otherwise great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: The sides cave in and you will not have much room inside to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: The sides of the tent cave in. The needs be a railing on the inside or a flat peace for the floor to keep the bottom extended out.
customer_reviews.author: artie Fields

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! We wanted it for an indoor pillow fort, reading book space and it’s PERFECT for that. I don’t know how it’d hold up outdoors but as an indoor permanent fixture we’re obsessed! It’s plenty big - my teens and even my husband and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: rlong68028

customer_reviews.title: Nice text.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is very nice. No odor at all. The canvas is a nice heavy weight but not excessively heavy. One of the poles did break within the first week, but the others are fine after 4 months,
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Poor poles construction
customer_reviews.text: The canvas part of this teepee is really amazing. It’s well made and really big. Bigger than I thought it would be. But the poles.. terrible. Just plain awful. There are too many connectors and they make the teepee wobbly and way taller than it should. Will be replacing the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna Marx

customer_reviews.title: Wear footwear in the dark when walking by this tent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this teepee and gives it 5 stars. I stubbed my toe on it walking through her room in the dark so I’m giving it 4 stars. I’m the parent and I paid for it, so it’s getting a 4 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: Autistic child approved
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic look. The cloth material is superb. It became the “safe” spot for an autistic child at a wedding reception. The material dampen the sound enough that he did not have a meltdown. Should get a padding or bring a lot of pillows like we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and huge!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this TP. The only minor dislike is that one of the poles was missing the hole to tie it up in the top. Luckily I had the tools to drill the wood. Very good quality, easy to install and its huge! My daughter's little kitchen fits right in along with some cozy pillows for her to read!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size for adults and multi use!
customer_reviews.text: Great teepee for adult use, really tall and wide. Could fit 4 adults easy. Would have loved additional color options and carry case
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Musacchia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, wonderful but the instructions could of explained more how to get the poles situated so it sit up straight. we had to watch other companies videos to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Demaree Skibicki

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviewes of products but this one really deserves one. We bought this teepee for our 2 year old son and we are so happy we did it! The quality is great, the material is very sturdy and the size is perfect. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa T

customer_reviews.title: Not  as described- overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: not 100% cotton canvas as described- 30%cotton 70% polyester!!!/ not white as described this was a birthday gift & very disappointing - too late to order another to arrive in time
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Belock-Phippen

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for my family of 6 to be in together!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. It took about 30 minutes to assemble. I had 4 children running around me with excitement, so it should probably only take about 10 minutes. My children love it! They are so excited to read every night in our Reading Tipi/teepee.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Everything about this product is great quality!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is the only teepee we have ever purchased but it seems to surpass the quality and size of other teepees sold in stores. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Turner Fam

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and my toddler loves it too .it’s big enough for adults and children . We bought pillows and blankets to sit on during story time . It did have all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was more than expected.. the quality is amazing.. and its really a awsime get away space for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! My kids live this. Exactly like picture. I and 5’7” and just about stand up inside!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Love it but
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and its huge! But the tent slides down no matter how I tie it together which is a pain to keep it standing right so my wife Adjust it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Troy Tarkan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use it on the beach as decoration for my 10th anniversary. This was awesome, did not even move with the Caribbean beach wind. Only thing is, it's not recomended to wash in the washer, that would be so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Paulina

customer_reviews.title: BIG, BEAUTIFUL and EASY to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEE IT!!! it was super easy to assemble. Is BIG my two daughters play inside with no problem! I have a 3.5 year old and a 2 year old. The fabric is great! It was shipped in perfect condition! If you are going to buy a Teepee buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: GONZALO CAPRILES

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but bigger than most
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality teepee for the money-I had to return it because it was too big. Make sure you measure for this one it’s a bit bigger than the other ones out there in this price range. Nice quality canvas and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to play room
customer_reviews.text: I had strong doubts when I saw how small the box was, but it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Well built; easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The tipi is great. Just as described, it is huge compared to others. Well built and easy to put together. My 9 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Steffan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this teepee. Doing their school work inside. Just the ticket for giving the two of them some space from each other. Big enough for both of them but they tend to take turns without prompting. They are six and eight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge
customer_reviews.text: Me + my little niece and nephew fit very comfortably in here! It’s so tall and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Big and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a big sturdy teepee. Was really simple to put together. Can easily hold 3-4 toddlers. We have a special needs granddaughter and the sensory deprivation is great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy I

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to build forts in our playroom and this was an instant hit. It was super easy to assemble and stores easily as well!
customer_reviews.author: S Allison Feider

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just put my teepee up and i absolutely love it! It’s super easy to put together and fits in my house. The canvas is really good quality and it’s large enough for my 11 year old to spread out with tons of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great teepee
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teepee. It’s made of a nice weight white cotton fabric. The poles went together easily although they didn’t go all the way into the connecting pladtic pieces and I didn’t want to force them. Once up you have about a 5 foot hectagon realistically to play in. It almost reaches the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Cara424

customer_reviews.title: We are missing most of the pole pieces
customer_reviews.text: We just went to set this up and we only received the connectors. We are missing the 5 bottom poles, the 20 center poles and the 5 drilled poles. How do we get these pieces?
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Wiles

customer_reviews.title: huge tent, great for family time
customer_reviews.text: The tent is easy to assembly, it's beautiful and huge, enough for 4 kids to play with room, it's stable and also tall enough so even I can stand inside (I'm 156CM tall)...... Great thing!! very good product.
customer_reviews.author: pazit karplus

customer_reviews.title: Well made tent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandkids!! Bigger than I thought sooo very nice !! Love that the bottom is attached
customer_reviews.author: Wendi M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Seams start tearing during our first use and the teepee itself is incredibly difficult to spread out and have layout properly/evenly. Size is good, but this is a subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davis

product_meta.title: Teepee Tent for Kids | White Kids Teepee Tent | Tipi Tents Indoor Outdoor | Play Tent Foldable 7 Feet Tall - 5 Poles | Customizable Cotton Blend Tent | Large Childrens Teepee Tents Girls and Boys Kids
feature_bullets: ✅ LARGE 7 FEET TALL DURABLE 100% CANVAS KIDS TEEPEE TENT Soft, Breathable and BPA free Best quality for your child: PEP STEP teepee tents are made of 100% NON-toxic, unpainted cotton blend canvas. The tent poles are made of sturdy PINE WOOD and are free of chemical odors and harmful substances.

✅ PLAY ROOM TENT HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: 5 Pine Wood Poles (95" Total Lenght: 5 Bottom Poles, 5 Precise Drilled Upper Poles, Ten Center Poles and 16 Connectors, spare extra connector included), Highest QUALITY CANVAS TeePee is a great indoor tent for kids which is easy to assemble and kids play tent allowing for hours of playtime, reading timed a special place to watch movies

✅ FULLY EQUIPPED Pillowfort Teepee tent for kids Includes GIFT BOX, Floor Cover, Curtains, Windows and Inner Slip Pocket. SUPER easy installation: with curtains, front flaps could be closed completely, offering children safe personal space encouraging them to become independent

✅ PORTABLE & FOLDABLE Teepee tent for boys and girls Made to be portable and practical, Each of the 5 poles attach to each other using 3 joint connector attachments so that you can build and carry your child’s favorite teepee anywhere in an easy practical and SPACE SAVING way
✅ RISK FREE PURCHASE-LIFETIME WARRANTY-MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We are extremely confident in the durability and performance of this BEST IN CLASS Teepee Tent your complete satisfaction is guaranteed.
